Untitled Lecture: Episode of Social Philosophers of the Western World (partial)
Untitled Lecture: Episode of Social Philosophers of the Western World (partial)

Pulled from a tape supposed to be part of the recordings of the Sunrise Semester program, recording comprises an episode of Social Philosophers of the Western World presented by Meeta (sp?) and the City College of New York with Professor Henry M. Magid. Recording comprises only 34 minutes of the 60 minute lecture.
